properties.name: task.handler.thread.pool.threads.size
properties.description: The number of threads to keep in the pool, even if they are idle.

properties.name: task.handler.thread.pool.threadsSizeMax
properties.description: The maximum number of threads to allow in the pool.

properties.name: task.handler.thread.pool.keepAliveTime
properties.description: When the number of threads is greater than the core, this is the maximum time that excess idle threads will wait for new tasks before terminating.

properties.name: task.handler.thread.pool.shutdownTimeout
properties.description: The maximum time to wait in milliseconds to shutdown executors.

properties.name: task.handler.thread.pool.scheduledThreadsSize
properties.description: The number of threads in ScheduledThreadPool to keep in the pool, even if they are idle.

properties.name: task.handler.thread.pool.exportAliveTime
properties.description: The maximum time to wait download exported file (in minutes).

properties.name: authorization.token
properties.description: A token for authorization to the API, which should be in the request header.
